text: Radoslav Brđanin (9 February 1948 – 7 September 2022) was a Bosnian Serb political leader and a war criminal. In 2004 he was sentenced to 32 years in jail by the International Criminal Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia for crimes he did during the Bosnian War. He died on 7 September 2022. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina politicians Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina war criminals
title: Radoslav Brđanin
